FuncDef: The reset nd packet filter statistics command clears statistics about invalid ND packet attack defense.
CLIs: reset nd packet filter statistics [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about invalid ND packet attack defense, run the reset nd packet filter statistics command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
